Title: Pilchard and the Field Mice
Plot: Now that Robert has taken over the yard, Wendy can move to Sunflower Valley. The machines set up Wendy's caravan, complete with solar panels. Bob is having a lot of trouble getting things done fast enough with his dad Robert slowing him down, and Wendy realises she'll miss Farmer Pickles's organic eggs. Robert finds some chicken wire and timber, but then he goes missing.
